features: 72H Intense Moisture: Hyaluron Plump Hydrating Conditioner instantly detangles, moisturizes and replumps dry hair for up to 72 hours, without weigh down, when used with Hyaluron Plump Hair Care system. Leaves hair bouncy, shiny and free-flowing

Hair Products Inspired by Skincare: Expertly formulated with Hyaluronic Care Complex to replenish moisture and provide 72H hydration. From the number 1 Skincare Serum Brand - L'Oreal. Freshly scented with berries, cherry blossom, vanilla and sandalwood

Hydrating Routine for Dry and Dehydrated Hair: Gently cleanse with paraben-free Elvive Shampoo, prime with Flash Hydration Wonder Water, then apply hair conditioner to detangle and moisturize. Finish with Replumping Serum to revitalize hair

Custom Hair Care Solutions for All Hair Types: From expertly formulated hair treatments, masks and serums to nourishing leave-in conditioners and frizz-defying shampoo and conditioner, we've got what you need

L'Oreal Paris Innovation: We are a total beauty care company that combines the latest in technology with the highest in quality for the ultimate in hair color, hair care, hair style, skin care and cosmetics
body.description: Elvive Hyaluron + Plump paraben-free hydrating formulas help achieve shinier, free-flowing strands for dry, dehydrated hair without weigh down. Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid, Elvive Hyaluron + Plump regimen, inspired by skincare, helps hair fibers retain long-lasting moisture. Hydrating Shampoo gently cleanses and instantly hydrates while the Hydrating Conditioner instantly detangles and moisturizes dry hair. The Wonder Water provides flash hydration for soft, weightless hair, and the replumping serum, with 2 percent Hyaluronic Care Complex, serves as a daily moisturizing leave-in, giving a full boost of moisture to dry hair and leaving hair bouncier and shinier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silky smooth conditioner.
reviews.reviewText: I really like the smell & the creaminess of this conditioner. It seemed to really condition my dry, damaged hair & reduced my frizziness. Great price too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and Cheap!
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with this conditioner!It leaves my bleached hair and my extensions so hydrated and smooth and I use half the amount for half of the price for higher end brands. Doesn't leave a heavy residue behind despite feeling like a richer formula.So good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisture and smell
reviews.reviewText: This is the best non-professionally sold conditioner I’ve ever purchased. Best smell and greatest moisture additive to my dry hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad at all
reviews.reviewText: I tried this because I absolutely LOVED the conditioning rinse from this line.The scent is amazing & stays after my hair dries. It brings so much vitality back to my strands & leaves them soft.I didn't give it 5 stars because it's definitely not as good as the rinse from this line.It doesn't make the hair as shiny & doesn't detangle/defrizz as masterfully as the rinse either. However, it still does get the job done well enough to stay loyal to it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this conditioner to go with the shampoo I had already purchased (but couldn't find the conditioner to match at the store). And let me tell you...it was the most amazing experience I have had with a store bought product. It left my hair feeling so amazingly soft and healthy! I got so many comments from people asking if I did something with my hair, it made me feel so good. It's the best store bought product for your hair and one amazing value for the price! I am a new fan and have already repurchased it a couple times! Highly suggest trying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Conditioner EVER!
reviews.reviewText: I’m 56 & I have fine, blonde hair that tangles easily plus its color treated & tends to be dry. I’ve tried so many conditioners in my life & most of them never worked very well. I am beyond THRILLED with this conditioner! I was able to comb my hair without using a detangling spray & my hair feels silky & hydrated!!!!! It also has shine now! I knew it would probably be wonderful when I saw that it had hyaluronic acid in it. I hope they never stop making it! Now I’m anxious to try the shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Leaves hair feeling kinda icky
reviews.reviewText: I like this brand a lot and this does smell very good. However, after it dries it leaves my hair feeling heavy and like there's product in it even when there isn't. My hair is thin and kind of fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than salon conditioner. Hydrates without weighing my hair down.
reviews.reviewText: I have searched for a conditioner than could really hydrate my dry hair without weighing it down or making it look greasy. I have tried very expensive brands and wasn't completely happy with them. A friend suggested L'Oreal Paris Elvive Hyaluron Plump Hydrating Conditioner and I bought it and the shampoo with no expectations of having a good experience. BOOM! Holy grail. This conditioner is rich and concentrated. It makes my hair so smooth and soft but doesn't weigh it down and I have plenty of volume. I never thought a drugstore hair product could do what this one does for my hair. I color it, use hot styling tools on it, apply loads of styling products, and it is naturally dry so I need a lot of help. This conditioner (and the accompanying shampoo) does it. About every six weeks, I will I use Elvive Total Repair 5 Damage-Erasing Balm with Almond and Protein and my hair in in great condition. I am glad I found an inexpensive line of haircare products that finally work for me.
I love the smell easy to use

J’ai beaucoup de difficulté à garder mes cheveux en santé, ils cassent facilement… j’utilise ce produit et ils semblent beaucoup mieux. Même mon conjoint a commencé à l’utiliser et voit une différence avec ses cheveux !
Best hair day ever. Thanks for a great product and super fast shipping
Great value for the size. Smells amazing!!
